# Welcome {.unnumbered}

Hello <a href="https://www.ucl.ac.uk/bartlett/casa/"><img src="general_images/casa_logo.jpg" alt="" width="120" align="right" style="margin: 0 1em 0 1em"/></a> and welcome to the Term 2 module Remotely Sensing Cities and Environments.
